canvas_sdk.methods.custom_gradebook_columns module¶

canvas_sdk.methods.custom_gradebook_columns.create_custom_gradebook_column(request_ctx, course_id, column_title, column_position, column_hidden=None, column_teacher_notes=None, **request_kwargs)[source]¶

Create a custom gradebook column

param request_ctx:
 The request context
type request_ctx:
 :class:RequestContext
param course_id:
 (required) ID
type course_id:string
param column_title:
 (required) no description
type column_title:
 string
param column_position:
 (required) The position of the column relative to other custom columns
type column_position:
 int
param column_hidden:
 (optional) Hidden columns are not displayed in the gradebook
type column_hidden:
 boolean or None
param column_teacher_notes:
 (optional) Set this if the column is created by a teacher. The gradebook only supports one teacher_notes column.
type column_teacher_notes:
 boolean or None
return:Create a custom gradebook column
rtype:requests.Response (with CustomColumn data)
canvas_sdk.methods.custom_gradebook_columns.delete_custom_gradebook_column(request_ctx, course_id, id, **request_kwargs)[source]¶

Permanently deletes a custom column and its associated data

 The request context
type request_ctx:
 :class:RequestContext
param course_id:
 (required) ID
type course_id:string
param id:(required) ID
type id:string
return:Delete a custom gradebook column
rtype:requests.Response (with CustomColumn data)
canvas_sdk.methods.custom_gradebook_columns.list_custom_gradebook_columns(request_ctx, course_id, per_page=None, **request_kwargs)[source]¶

List all custom gradebook columns for a course

param request_ctx:
 The request context
type request_ctx:
 :class:RequestContext

 (required) ID
type course_id:string
param per_page:(optional) Set how many results canvas should return, defaults to config.LIMIT_PER_PAGE
type per_page:integer or None
return:List custom gradebook columns
rtype:requests.Response (with array data)
canvas_sdk.methods.custom_gradebook_columns.list_entries_for_column(request_ctx, course_id, id, per_page=None, **request_kwargs)[source]¶

This does not list entries for students without associated data.

type id:string

canvas_sdk.methods.custom_gradebook_columns.reorder_custom_columns(request_ctx, course_id, order, **request_kwargs)[source]¶

Puts the given columns in the specified order

<b>200 OK</b> is returned if successful

param request_ctx:
 The request context
type request_ctx:
 :class:RequestContext
param course_id:
 (required) ID
type course_id:string
param order:(required) no description
type order:integer
return:Reorder custom columns
rtype:requests.Response (with void data)
